MooseX::Types::Moose(3pm) User Contributed Perl Documentation MooseX::Types::Moose(3pm)

NAME

MooseX::Types::Moose - Type exports that match the types shipped with Moose

VERSION

version 0.50

SYNOPSIS

  package Foo;
  use Moose;
  use MooseX::Types::Moose qw( ArrayRef Int Str );
  use Carp qw( croak );
  has 'name',
    is  => 'rw',
    isa => Str;
  has 'ids',
    is  => 'rw',
    isa => ArrayRef[Int];
  sub add {
      my ($self, $x, $y) = @_;
      croak 'First arg not an Int'  unless is_Int($x);
      croak 'Second arg not an Int' unless is_Int($y);
      return $x + $y;
  }
  1;

DESCRIPTION

This package contains a virtual library for MooseX::Types that is able to export all types known to Moose. See MooseX::Types for general usage information.

METHODS

type_storage

Overrides MooseX::Types::Base' "type_storage" to provide a hash reference containing all built-in Moose types.

SEE ALSO

Moose, Moose::Util::TypeConstraints

SUPPORT

Bugs may be submitted through the RT bug tracker <https://rt.cpan.org/Public/Dist/Display.html?Name=MooseX-Types> (or bug-MooseX-Types@rt.cpan.org <mailto:bug-MooseX-Types@rt.cpan.org>).

There is also a mailing list available for users of this distribution, at <http://lists.perl.org/list/moose.html>.

There is also an irc channel available for users of this distribution, at "#moose" on "irc.perl.org" <irc://irc.perl.org/#moose>.
